item.title: Hotfix 6.1.5
item.description:
Greetings everyone!

Today, we‚Äôre releasing Hotfix 6.1.5, bringing new fixes and tweaks to Total War: WARHAMMER III including various fixes to maneater psychology, quest battles and how Wood Elves rumble in the jungle.

Without further ado, let‚Äôs get into it.

‚Äî Anastasija Dolgo≈°ejeva // Senior Community Manager // Your friendly neighbourhood penguin

Campaign
General // Gameplay
  • Fixed a crash to desktop after manually winning Vilitch‚Äôs Quest Battle Vessel of Chaos and waiting for the loading back to the campaign map.
  • Fixed bug where Ogre Camps would move after every battle and every game load.
  • Marching stance movement extents now should be again shown correctly while the military force is in default stance.
  • The Rite of Awakening event video now correctly plays rather than the 2D image.
  • When the user opens and immediately close the UI panel for The Skull Throne the script will be canceled to prevent scripted tour pop-ups.
  • Fixed an issue where the the campaign camera went under the terrain in some cases..
  • Chaos Dwarfs when occupying the Galleon's Graveyard now have a garrison.
  • Jungles now function as forests when applying Wood Elf "during forest battles" effects like the skill for Waystalkers, "The Endless Hunters".
Skills
  • The Exalted Lord of Change Skill "Impossible Egotist" now correctly give heroes in their army "Silenced".
  • Snow Leopards are now affected by the Hag Witch's skill "Wildkeeper".
UI
  • Fix getting "Under-City Discovered!" messages for settlements belonging to other factions.
  • Fixed a crash when trying to open technology tree from Gorbads Tactics menu on non players turn.

Battle
General // Gameplay
  • Issue fixed where multiple RoR Gyrobombers attacking in fast forward are causing game crashes.
  • Fixed an issue where Ulrika Maldova would always be staggered by powerful attacks when mounted on a horse.
  • Fixed an issue with one of Arbaal‚Äôs quest battles so that Vampire Coast armies are no longer visible before the reinforcements to prevent the pop-up message about hidden foes to appear.
  • Fixed an issue where one of Skulltaker's quest battles could be won without fighting the entire enemy army.
  • Fixed an issue in the Overtyrant‚Äôs Crown quest battle where one of the waves will attack the player armies right after they leave the reinforcement location.
  • Golgfag & the Eshin Maneater now have Immune to Psychology attribute like other meaneaters.
Battle Maps
  • Fixed some floating vegetation on The Dragon Isles battle map.
  • Mopped up invisible shallow water on the Road to Talabheim battle map.
‚Äî The Total War Team

‚ö† IMPORTANT

If you experience any issues after downloading the update, please take a moment to Verify the integrity of the game files first to ensure there were no issues when downloading. A step-by-step guide can be found in this article.

If the issues persist, please visit our support site for additional troubleshooting steps and assistance.

item.title: More fixes
item.description:
Hey all, here's a list of some more changes to the game with this new patch

Please restart Steam and remember that most patches are not compatible with older ones, so you will not see games from the previous build in the game browser. It will take a little while for new ones to start up - or feel free to create a game!


  • Fixed issue with some challenges not progressing
  • Fixed crash bug at the end of match rewards screen
  • Fixed bug where hosts were not able to use their customized vehicles
  • Fixed bug when selecting alternate abilities in the Kustomize screen
  • Improved race waypoint sync for Free Roam mode
  • Fixed issue with full games showing as 15/16 in game browser
  • Swapped Konstruct skin reward on existing challenge to scrap boost, as it was causing issues
  • Added new challenge to both Looted Wagon and Grot Mega Tank that reward players with the Konstruct skin
  • Added daily Rukkatrukk challenge, 6 kills + assists
  • Added daily Trukk challenge, 3 kills
  • Attempted to improve performance on Da Dust Up and Da Gorge
  • Fixed some minor collision and visual issues in some maps
  • Removed "Mob Up!" achievement for the time being, as parties are not currently in the game
  • Disabled daily party challenge since playing in a party is no longer possible.
  • Fix for showing player level at Kill Kam and MVP screens
We've been pretty on top of issues and still are working on the bigger ones like hit reg and host migration. We'll let everyone know when there's news on that or other high priority items ÀêsteamthumbsupÀê

item.title: Team Balancing + Some Fixes
item.description:
Just dropped a small patch before the weekend. Please be sure to restart Steam to make sure you've got it!

NOTE: You may see less games in the game browser until more people download the update, as there will still be some people playing in the previous build. Those games won't show up in the latest build and vise versa



Here's whats up:
  • improved skill calculation (and thus team balancing)
  • Players can now switch to the losing team at any point in the match as long as the losing team has equal players or less
  • Prevention of players to be able to join games that are in their ending phase to avoid issues. Games in ending phase now show up greyed out in the game browser,
  • Game browser now dynamically updates,
  • Prevented votekick being able to kick host
  • Crash bug fix relating to player challenges
  • Longer challenges now show HUD popups more frequently (every 10% instead of 25%),
  • Rukkatrukk Blood Axes kit gets hidden since its not supposed to be unlockable until later
  • Fix for Trukk skulls kit texture issue,
  • Fix for PLAY GAME screen explainer not accepting keyboard/gamepad inputs (Steam Deck suffered from this),
  • Da Gorge map has expanded boundaries now, lighter nighttime version
  • networking clean-up, more solidity,
  • Progression data storage improvements,
Major things up next:
  • Host "migration" so that if a host leaves or gets disconnected for any reason, the lobby of players is not disbanded, but instead is put in a game together with the same settings with a new host
  • Hit reg improvements
  • Warbands system (clans/clubs). This was meant to go into the launch version but just had some UI still left to do on it
Happy krumpin!
Some of us devs should be playing over the weekend a bit so looking forward to SMASHIN' SUM GITS togetherÀêsteamthumbsupÀê
